message_1: Suppose we have two points on an elliptic curve E: P(3, 10) and Q(9, 7). Find the coordinates of the point P + Q on the curve E.
message_2:
To find the coordinates of the point P + Q on the elliptic curve E, we need to know the equation of the curve E. An elliptic curve is defined by an equation of the form:

y^2 = x^3 + ax + b

Please provide the values of a and b for the elliptic curve E.
